parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>TRUE. The post contains "CMF 11240015" at the end, indicating it's likely electoral propaganda.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>TRUE. While not explicitly naming Brian Cristian, the post clearly refers to him as "Un ales" (an elected official) and highlights his actions in Parliament.  The "USR Maramures" byline further strengthens this connection, linking the post to a specific political party and candidate.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>TRUE. This is a paid Facebook post, inherently designed for wide public reach. The targeting parameters (age, location) further confirm this intention.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>TRUE. The post's core message ("Alegeți oameni care muncesc pentru voi" - Choose people who work for you) directly encourages voters to support the candidate. The emphasis on his parliamentary activity aims to portray him as a hardworking representative, influencing voters' choices.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>FALSE. While the post mentions parliamentary activity, it lacks the objectivity and neutrality expected of journalistic reporting. It's presented as a promotional piece, focusing on the candidate's achievements to garner support, not as an impartial analysis.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>FALSE. The content is not a personal opinion; it's a carefully crafted message designed to promote a candidate and influence voting behavior.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>890958233105596</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post, paid for by USR Maramures, fulfills all criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It directly refers to a candidate (Brian Cristian), albeit implicitly, through highlighting his actions in Parliament and using the party affiliation in the byline. The post targets a wide audience via a paid Facebook campaign, and its clear objective is to influence voters by presenting the candidate in a positive light and encouraging them to vote for him. The post's content is promotional, not journalistic, lacking the objectivity required for neutral reporting. The presence of a CMF number further confirms its nature as electoral propaganda.  The post's timing, after the official campaign period, is a crucial factor.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate> <name>Brian Cristian</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>USR</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
USR Maramureș, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei postări pe Facebook (ID: 890958233105596) după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, care constituie propagandă electorală, având în vedere că promovează implicit candidatul Brian Cristian prin evidențierea activității sale parlamentare și afilierea la USR, cu scopul clar de a influența votul alegătorilor. Postarea, plătită cu suma de 800-899 RON, a atins o audiență estimată la 50.000-100.000 persoane, conform datelor din Ad Library.  Prezența CMF-ului 11240015 confirmă caracterul de propagandă electorală.  Conținutul nu este jurnalistic, ci promotional, lipsit de obiectivitate.  Această acțiune contravine prevederilor legale privind încetarea campaniei electorale și interzicerea propagării materialelor electorale după încheierea acesteia.  Datele de contact ale advertiserului sunt maramures@usrmm.ro și +40751926939.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
